category.name: Active Workspace.Massive Model Visualization
category.category_description: Active Workspace Massive Model Visualization preferences

preference.name: MMV_keep_generated_files
preference.preference_description: With this preference it is possible to preserve the generated files for further examination in case if any error observed during complete file generation on tcserver. This preference can have one of below 3 values 1. on_error - Keep the generated files if error is occurred. 2. always - Always keep the generated files. 3. never - Default value. Never keep generated files.
